X00T.changelog:
- CLEAN FLASH REQUIRED (If you are coming from build with 4.4 kernel, i.e: before 09.04.2021 build) 

- Updated blobs from LA.UM.9.6.2.r1-04100-89xx.0
- Updated drm widevine to 1.3

alioth.changelog:
- Optimise dex flags
- overlay: enable WCG mode
- libinit: Properly set ro.product.*.name/marketname
- Fixes weird touch/scroll issues on fp touch event
- Sepolicy: Address more denials
- Kernel: USB: pd: Revert some CAF patches
- Kernel: Update touchscreen ft3658 k11 firmware to the latest available release
- Kernel: Disable coresight
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Installation instruction: https://forum.xda-developers.com/t/rom-11-0-0-alioth-aliothin-arrowos-11-0-official-weekly.4279481/post-85045261

apollo.changelog:
- Merge all changes from LineageOS device tree
- Volume adjusted for safety

beryllium.changelog:
- sdm845-common:
Update blobs to MIUI polaris V12.5.1.0.QDGCNXM
- beryllium: Update blobs from V12.0.3.0.QEJMIXM
- Update display and adreno blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update WFD blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update OMX codecs and VPP to OnePlus6 R
- Update Configstore blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update Power-off alarm blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update ESE, PerMgr and Time services blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update IRQ balance blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Fixed Smart Charging permissions and sepolicy
- Kernel: Merge android-4.9-q google kernel common (4.9.277)
- Kernel: Merge CAF tag LA.UM.9.3.r1-02800-sdm845.0
- Kernel: arch/arm64: dts: disable dfps in jdi fhd panel and ebbg ft8716 panel
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Update 2021-01-01 and earlier builds only with clean flash!

cheeseburger.changelog:
- Upstream changes
- Fixed camera access for FaceUnlock

cmi.changelog:
! ! ! Firmware and vendor require update to V12.2.4.0.RJACNXM.

- Show FOD Animation settings
- Update WifiOverlay and TetheringOverlay
- wifi: Enable QPower and Deep sleep together
- Remove extra GBoard spacing
- Update CarrierConfig overlays
- More comfortable rounded corners

davinci.changelog:
10/07/2021
- Fixed the fingerprint dialog
- Disabled the SIM is HD capable notification
- Enabled ambient display settings

20/06/2021
- Rebased the device sources
- Switched to the Qualcomm Power HAL
- Switched to a different screen off fod implementation

22/05/2021
- Improved power consumption
- Switched to VantomKernel

11/05/2021
- Updated blobs from MIUI 21.4.28

Notes:
- Recommended firmware is MIUI 20.10.20 or higher (China Beta)
- Minimum firmware is MIUI V12.0.5.0
- Recommended recovery is the OFFICIAL TWRP

dumpling.changelog:
- Upstream changes
- Fixed camera access for FaceUnlock

gauguin.changelog:
- Improve haptics.
- Update audio configs.
- Misc changes and blob updates.

Note:
- Required to be on the latest android 11 f/w and vendor.

ginkgo.changelog:
- Updated blobs, GPS HAL and kernel to LA.UM.9.11.r1-04500-NICOBAR.0 (CAF)
- Updated MIUI blobs from V12.0.1.0.RCOMIXM
- Kernel upstreamed to v4.14.241 (android-4.14-stable)
- Enabled skiaGL as UI renderer (fix tiktok and few other apps crashing)
- Boost GPU to max for blur and disable blur by default
- Increased voice call volume steps to 6
- Freed some RAM from useless virtual framebuffer
- Added offline charging LED indicator
- Removed schedtune boosts to reduce heat
- Enabled IORap prefetching for faster app launch
- Enabled compile-time CPU specific optimizations
- Switched to QTI battery health implementation
- Undervolt GPU to reduce heat and power draw
- Misc kernel optimizations & fixes

lavender.changelog:
Latest build:
- Address tethering_service denial
- kernel: Update to 4.4.274
- kernel: Update to LA.UM.9.2.r1-03400-SDMxx0.0
- Other fixes and improvement

miatoll.changelog:
Device Changelogs:

• Upstreamed kernel to 4.14.239
• Merged latest tag LA.UM.9.1.r1-10600-SMxx0.0 in kernel

mido.changelog:
Note:
- These are still going to continue on 3.18 builds only.
- Requests for 4.9 builds will be ignored.

This decision has been taken as per the equal no.of requests from both sides of the parties and concluded by the outcome of adverse performance affects.

monet.changelog:
- Optimize dex flags
- Enable Seamless Transfer
- Address sepolicy denials
- Update blobs to MIUI V12.5.1.0.RJIMIXM
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Kernel:
- Merged CAF tag LA.UM.9.12.r1-12200-SMxx50.QSSI12.0 for msm-4.19 and wlan
- drivers: remove xiaomi early fingerprint wakeup optimization
- usb: pd: Revert some CAF patches (fixed random panic usb)
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Request MIUI Android 11 firmware and vendor.

phoenix.changelog:
• Force show network traffic on the status bar
• Add offline charging LED indicator
• Relax refresh rate switching a bit
• Define OEM fast charge sysfs node

sanders.changelog:
Clean flash must (kindly backup your data before flashing)
improved  performance
Enabled ZRAM by default
Tuned ZRAM for better performance
Compiled with hwui for better performance
Switched to Mad Kernel 2.0

surya.changelog: - Update blobs- Fix and update NFC configs to MIUI 12.0.8.0- audio: Define acdb ids for voice recorder (Fixed voice recorder in some apps)- Address selinux denials- Use actual QuicksilveR kernel sources- Fixed Netflix video playback- Add missed props- Relax refresh rate switching- Disable wide color display- Import hotword enrollment blobs and drop soundtrigger- Import USB init scripts from stock- parts: Update clear speaker audio from MIUI 12- Misc fixes and upstream changes.Note:- Required to be on android 11 f/w.- A clean flash is mandatory while switching from pre OSS builds. Please backup your data beforehand!

sweet.changelog:
For installation information, refer to https://telegra.ph/Installation-of-ArrowOS-sweetsweetin---included-vendor-05-10

27/07/2021
• Added a ring to the cutout camera for fixing the halo effect on low conditions (only shown when the front camera is in use)

24/07/2021
• Reduced saturation level
• Added Dirac sound enhancer
• Fixed bad colors until turning the screen off and on

12/07/2021
• Merged July security patch
• Added KCAL color profiles
• Merged the tag LA.UM.9.1.r1-10500-SMxxx0.QSSI12.0 into the kernel
• Improved vibration patterns and strength
• Increased reserved space for extra add-ons
• Fixed oversaturated colors
• Updated blobs from MIUI V12.5.4.0
• Built more stuff from source

10/06/2021
• Fixed Amazon Prime Video HD and Netflix HDR
• Updated blobs from MIUI 12.5.3.0
• Some other under the hood improvements

04/06/2021
• Switched to OSS display stack
• Switched to OSS media stack
• Fixed KCAL settings
• Added a preview image to the KCAL settings page
• Fixed screen flickering completely
• Reduced delay for device specific settings to apply at boot

vayu.changelog:
- Fix power-off charging
- Manual provisioning works
- Misc changes
- This is final build which requires pre-installed MIUI vendor hence upcoming OTAs will be blocked as safeguard.

- Recommended Minimum vendor+firmware: 
  INDIA: MIUI 12.0.4.0 or above
  EEA: 12.0.5.0 or above
  GLOBAL: 12.0.6.0 or above

violet.changelog:
- Updated blobs to LA.UM.9.1.r1-10200-SMxxx0.0
- Removed Violet parts and added Mi sound Enhancer to Settings>sounds and fps meter can be accessed through QS tiles
- Removed Smart Charging
- Enabled 24bit Playback as default
- Fixes weird touch/scroll issues on fp touch event
- Added Color modes 
- Enabled iorap
- Rebased and updated kernel to LA.UM.9.1.r1-10200-SMxxx0.0
- Upstreamed media HAL to LA.UM.9.1.r1-10200-SMxxx0.0
- Added LSE Atomic Optimization
- Added Dev frequency boost
- Backported LZ4 from mainline
